    • Method Detail

      • containsULEarfcn

        public boolean containsULEarfcn(double earfcn)
        Checks whether a upload frequency is contained in band object
        Parameters:
        earfcn - Frequency to check
        Returns:
        True if the upload frequency is contained in this band, else false

      • containsDLEarfcn

        public boolean containsDLEarfcn(double earfcn)
        Checks whether a download frequency is contained in band object

        earfcn - Frequency to check
        Returns:

      • GetBandFromEarfcn

        public static LTEBand GetBandFromEarfcn(double earfcn)
        Parameters:
        earfcn - Frequency to check
        Returns:
        LTEBand object for matched band, or band 0 object if invalid earfcn is passed
